thread.title: Which Kiwi beach is one of the world's 5 best hidden gems?
thread.title_full: Which Kiwi beach is one of the world's 5 best hidden gems?

title: Which Kiwi beach is one of the world's 5 best hidden gems?
text:
Which Kiwi beach is one of the world's 5 best hidden gems? Last updated 13:09, February 25 2017 123RF 
Farewell Spit beach is one of the top five secret beaches in the world, as judged by travellers in a survey by tourism company Kuoni. 
Just days after TripAdvisor announced its top 10 beaches in New Zealand, another survey shows we have one of the world's best hidden beaches. 
And no, it's not on the TripAdvisor list, and that's probably because it's a little out of the way. 
Tourism company Kuoni surveyed 303 experts and 2000 travellers to reveal the world's best secret beaches, and it turns out Farewell Spit at the top of the South Island is in the top five. 123RF 
The spit extends right out into the Tasman Sea. 
The isolated beach, which has been in the news for all the wrong reasons this month, due to hundreds of whale strandings, is said to be "ideal for explorers and shutterbugs".
